sentences.en: Don’t worry, we’ll get the money back somehow.
sentences.cn: 别担心，我们总会把那些钱拿回来的。

sentences.en: Franklin and his thirteen-year-old son somehow got separated in the crush.
sentences.cn: 富兰克林和他13岁的儿子在人群中被挤散了。

sentences.en: He somehow managed to winkle Picard out of his room.
sentences.cn: 他不知用的什么法子将皮卡德逼出了房间。

sentences.en: He was somehow destined to become a rock messiah.
sentences.cn: 冥冥之中，他注定会成为摇滚乐的救世主。

sentences.en: He's been very quiet and withdrawn, sort of different, somehow.
sentences.cn: 不知什么缘故，他最近十分沉默，有点异样。

sentences.en: Maybe we could glue it together somehow or other .
sentences.cn: 也许我们可以想什么办法把它粘起来。

sentences.en: She bowed her head in a gesture somehow reminiscent of royalty.
sentences.cn: 她低头的姿势让人想起皇室风范。

sentences.en: Somehow he tells these stories without a note of horror.
sentences.cn: 不知为什么他讲这些故事时一点都不害怕。

sentences.en: Somehow I knew he would tell me the truth.
sentences.cn: 不知何故，我总觉得他会把真相告诉我的。

sentences.en: Somehow Karin managed to cope with the demands of her career.
sentences.cn: 卡琳设法达到了其职业的要求。

sentences.en: Somehow she steadied herself and murmured, "Have you got a cigarette?"
sentences.cn: 她设法让自己镇定下来，并小声问：“你有烟吗？”

sentences.en: Somehow she'd always been a child in his mind, pure and virginal.
sentences.cn: 不知何故，她在他心里一直是个天真无邪的孩子。

sentences.en: Somehow, I just don’t think it’ll work.
sentences.cn: 不知为什么，我总觉得那样行不通。

sentences.en: Somehow, I managed to lose my keys.
sentences.cn: 我不知怎的竟然把钥匙弄丢了。

sentences.en: The living organisms somehow concentrated the minerals by biological processes.
sentences.cn: 生命体通过某种生物过程聚集矿物质。

sentences.en: The whole thing is somehow a bit Mickey Mouse.
sentences.cn: 不知怎的，整件事情有点幼稚。

sentences.en: Watercolour still seems somehow to be the poor relation of oil painting.
sentences.cn: 水彩画似乎仍比油画略逊一筹。

sentences.en: We must, somehow, find a way to loosen the bonds of tradition.
sentences.cn: 我们不管怎样都必须找到摆脱传统束缚的途径。

sentences.en: We'll manage somehow, you and me. I know we will.
sentences.cn: 我和你，我们总能应付过去的。我知道我们会的。

words.tran_cn: 以某种方法,设法地,不择手段

phrases.tran_cn: 设法，想办法；莫名其妙地；以某种方法
不知道什么原因你就会做到（歌词）

trans.tran_cn: 以某种方式，用某种方法，不知什么缘故，不知怎的
trans.tran_en: in some way, or by some means, although you do not know how
